titleStmt.title: Of the soul of the world and of particular souls in a letter to Mr. Lock, occasioned by Mr. Keil's reflections upon an essay lately published concerning reason / by the author of that essay.
titleStmt.author: Burthogge, Richard, 1638?-ca. 1700.

notesStmt.note: Written by Richard Burthogge. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
